author: dreiss
msg: Thrift: Allow a custom User-Agent with the Cocoa THttpClient.
Submitted by Andrew McGeachie, the author of the Cocoa bindings.

author: mcslee
msg: Thrift CSharp build to check compiler return code
Summary: If non-zero, toss an error to the log
Other Notes: Submitted by Will Palmeri

author: cpiro
msg: Summary: They both use the same handler for all connections and thus assume the handler is thread-safe. The TThreadPoolServer preserves threads, so it wouldn't be too hard to make a variant that used a separate handler for each thread and thus didn't require thread safety.
Other Notes: contributed by William Morgan (w@adap.tv)

author: dreiss
msg: Thrift: Change the way constants are initialized to avoid segfaults.
Test Plan: Looked at the patch carefully.
